content: materials 10 15 skeins of purl soho s season alpaca 1 100% baby alpaca each skein is 218 yards - mc 5 10 skeins approximately 1 015 2 030 yards required - color a 1 skein approximately 124 218 yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 124 218 yards required - color c 1 skein approximately 124 218 yards required - color d 1 skein approximately 124 218 yards required - color e 1 skein approximately 124 218 yards required the cool palette uses the following colors… - mc heirloom white - color a sapphire blue - color b high tide - color c reef green - color d frond green - color e fresh pickle the warm palette includes… - mc heirloom white - color a purple foxglove - color b red plum - color c red pine - color d autumn oak - color e pink apricot you will also need… - us 4 3 5 mm 40- or 47-inch circular needles 2 gauge unblocked 28 stitches and 56 row = 4 inches in the slip_stitch pattern blocked 26 stitches and 52 row = 4 inches in the slip_stitch pattern sizes crib size throw size 27¾ inches wide x 40 inches long 42 inches wide x 53¾ inches long designed for purl soho by jake canton 3 1 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 3 http //www jakecanton com
